message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. I'm willing to start at $95 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am looking for a price closer to my valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $85.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Given the value I place on this product, I would like to counter with an offer of $90. This allows us both to feel satisfied with the transaction.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $87 to reach a fair compromise.
I see, Bob. Thank you for your continued engagement in this negotiation. I am willing to consider $88 as a counteroffer, aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I believe we're getting closer. I would like to propose a price of $86 to try to reach a fair agreement.
Thank you for your proposal, Bob. I am willing to consider $87 as a counteroffer, aiming for a balance between our valuations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $86.50, hoping to find a satisfactory midpoint for both of us.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I am willing to consider $86.25 as a counteroffer, aiming for a fair compromise.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final price of $86.10, aiming for a fair conclusion to our negotiations.
